name: Quote Generator
description: A web application that fetches a random quote from the forismatic API on demand and allows you to share the quote to twitter or tumblr.

name: Custom Countdown
description: A countdown application that allows you to set a date and counts down the days, hours, minutes and seconds till that day.

name: Music Player
description: A music player application that allows you to play/pause songs, navigate forward and backwards through songs and skip through a song using the progress bar.

name: Bookmark App
description: A web application that allows you to add bookmarks to other websites and stores the data in localstorage.
